name: Physics (itch) (Kjøb)
description:
This project was made in a day or two as a school project, The game is way more fun to play with friends but playing solo is also very relaxing. The game has a public server that may go down in the future. If it does, there is always a way to host it yourself.

How to make some fun games

1. Football

Making football in physics is very easy,

First, make four frozen cubes on both sides of the barriers,

Create a slippery sphere,

And spawn two bouncy shapes,

The first one to get the ball in the goal wins!

2. Fight to the death

This is the most simple game to make in the game so far, 

Create two bouncy shapes and put them on the right and left side of the map,

The last shape to stop moving wins

If you've created another game to play in physics, please share it in the comments, And I'll gladly add them to the list!
